definition: to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable

sentences.english: Learn how to handle setbacks. Life is made of ups, downs, and disappointments.
sentences.chinese: 學會如何處理挫折，生活由順利，挫折和失望構成。

sentences.english: The successful development of private colleges depends on its good ope rational mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 民辦高校的順利發展有賴於自身運行機制的完善。

sentences.english: All parts of the system integrate and interoperate with one another with no issues or problems.
sentences.chinese: 系統的所有部分都將順利地集成在一起並進行互操作。

sentences.english: Silver-plated copper center conductor for smooth, detailed sound production.
sentences.chinese: 鍍銀中心銅導體的順利，詳細的生產。

sentences.english: The Kansas City broadband plan is well advanced.
sentences.chinese: 堪薩斯城寬頻項目如今進展順利。

sentences.english: The plan to phase down environmental pollution is progressing successfully.
sentences.chinese: 逐步減少環境污染的計劃正在順利進行。

sentences.english: We hope everything will go swimmingly.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望一切進展順利。

sentences.english: A standpipe was crucial for smooth circulation .
sentences.chinese: 一根立管對實現順利循環至關重要。

sentences.english: Its metallation and addition to cyclopentanone proceeded well to 40.
sentences.chinese: 其金屬取代物能和環戊酮順利地反應得到40。

sentences.english: It is well-known that life is not always smooth.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，生活並不總是順順利利的。

sentences.english: Now paved and smooth as glass on over to Stumpy Meadows Reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 現在，順利鋪平玻璃上交給矮墩墩邁德斯水庫。

sentences.english: The fire puja went well effortlessly from beginning to the end.
sentences.chinese: 火供從頭至尾很輕鬆的進行得很順利。

sentences.english: I think we can now proceed with the last stages unhampered.
sentences.chinese: 我想我們現在可以順利地下完最後幾步。

sentences.english: The relationship between China and Macedonia has developed smoothly over the past years, Wen said.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶說，近年來中馬關係發展順利。

sentences.english: DRAGON:You will find this a comfortable and happy year, Dragon.
sentences.chinese: 對於屬龍的人來說，這將是非常順利而愉快的一年。

sentences.english: Our technique also can be extended to verify intransitive noninterference smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 我們的技術還可以擴展順利地驗證不及物動詞不干涉。

definition: to fight for/to strive for/to win over
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to be capable of/to be able to/can
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
